mapper.sql: select dp_dr_idx from dm_participants where dp_user_idx = #{loginUserIdx}
mapper.select: select dr.dr_idx, dr.dr_uuid, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_img, dm.dm_content, dm.dm_send_date, unread_cnt from dm_participants dp join dm_rooms dr on dp.dp_dr_idx = dr.dr_idx join users u on dp.dp_user_idx = u.user_idx join dm_messages dm on dm.fk_dm_dr_idx = dr.dr_idx join (select dm.fk_dm_dr_idx, count(*) unread_cnt from dm_participants dp join dm_messages dm on dp.dp_dr_idx = dm.fk_dm_dr_idx and dp.dp_user_idx = dm.fk_dm_user_idx where dp.dp_dr_idx in () and dm.fk_dm_user_idx != #{loginUserIdx} and dm.dm_send_date > all (select dp_last_date from dm_participants where dp_user_idx = #{loginUserIdx}) group by dm.fk_dm_dr_idx, dm.fk_dm_user_idx) um on um.fk_dm_dr_idx = dr.dr_idx where dp.dp_dr_idx in () and dp.dp_user_idx != #{loginUserIdx} and dm.dm_send_date in ( select max(dm_send_date) from dm_messages group by fk_dm_dr_idx) order by dm.dm_send_date desc;
